attributes.action: Celebrate Brexit! On March 29 2019, light torches around our country
attributes.background:
March 29 this year is an historic day in our country's rich and colourful history.
To celebrate Brexit, torches should be lit from John O'Groats to Lands End.
The torches would be lit at 11pm, the very moment we Leave the EU.
We must celebrate regaining our sovereignty and independence.

rejection.details:
This would not be a decision for the UK Government and Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236452
